alert.note: Alert for Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sioux and east central Goshen Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 445 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles west of Agate Bed National Monument, or 23 miles northeast of Torrington, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Agate Bed National Monument. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
